elements.name: Verify API: getActivityCount API return Total Activity Count

steps.name: "System_Admin" User invoke "getActivityCount"
User calls "getActivityCount" API with "Get" http Request
Verify Activity_Count result is greater than or equal to 0
The API call is success with StatusCode 200

elements.name: Verify API: createActivity API add Activity paylod

steps.name: "System_Admin" User "Add" Activity Payload with Param = "none"
User calls "createActivity" API with "Post" http Request
The API call is success with StatusCode 200
Verify response will return Activity instance
Verify Total Activity_Count increased by 1

elements.name: Verify API: createActivity API with no pattern Body

steps.name: "System_Admin" User "Add" Activity Payload  with no Activity Body and Param = "none"
User calls "createActivity" API with "Post" http Request
The API call is success with StatusCode 400

"message" in response body is "Required request body is missing: public com.ibm.dc.activity.entity.Activity com.ibm.dc.activity.controller.ActivityController.createActivity(java.lang.String,com.ibm.dc.activity.entity.Activity)"

arguments.val: "Required request body is missing: public com.ibm.dc.activity.entity.Activity com.ibm.dc.activity.controller.ActivityController.createActivity(java.lang.String,com.ibm.dc.activity.entity.Activity)"

elements.name: Verify API: getAllActivities API return List of All Activities

steps.name: "System_Admin" User invoke "getAllActivities"
User calls "getAllActivities" API with "Get" http Request
The API call is success with StatusCode 200
Verify response will return List of Activities
Total number of Activities in List is equal to getActivityCount
